name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TabTabTab - All In One Tab Manager

short.am,ar,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Supports your browsing by improving tab management.
short.bg: Разширението подобрява сърфирането, като дава възможност за управление на разделите в браузъра.
short.de: Diese Erweiterung unterstützt Sie beim Surfen, indem sie die Verwaltung der Tabs verbessert.
short.fr: Cette extension facilite votre navigation en améliorant la gestion des onglets.
short.ja: タブ管理を便利にすることでブラウジング体験を向上する拡張です。
short.ko: 브라우저 탭 관리를 도와주는 확장 프로그램입니다.
short.pl: To rozszerzenie usprawnia przeglądanie stron poprzez lepsze zarządzanie kartami.

long.am,ar,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,es,es_419,:
TabTabTab: All In One Tab Manager

Lost in a sea of tabs? Feel overwhelmed by their sheer number? TabTabTab is here to revolutionize the way you manage tabs. Experience a seamless, organized, and efficient browsing like never before.

🌟 Key Features:

* Comprehensive Tab Overview: View all your windows and tabs, including those grouped, in one unified list.
* Flexible Drag & Drop: Organize your tabs freely - be it pinned, grouped, or standalone.
* Window and Group Save & Restore: Quickly save and restore your tab groups and window sessions, ensuring a seamless continuation of your work.
* Automatic Tab Grouping: Tabs are automatically organized based on domain or subdomain, making it easier to manage and navigate your tabs.

✨ Other Features:

* Duplicate Tab Alert: Avoid clutter with automated alerts for duplicate tabs. Effortlessly close duplicates to streamline your browsing.
* Window Merge: Combine multiple browser windows into one with a single click, organizing scattered tabs into a cohesive session.
* Time Tracking: Keep track of how long it's been since you last accessed a tab.
* Essential Tab Operations: URL copying, pinning, grouping, and more.
* Screenshot Tool: Quickly capture the active tab's visible area.
* Efficient Navigation & Search: Jump to or find your desired tabs in seconds.
* Automatic Cleanup: Auto-remove tabs you haven't accessed based on your preferences.
* Side Panel Tab Overview: Easily access a list of your tabs through a convenient side panel.
* Dark Mode: Switch to a darker, more focused look whenever you wish.

The source code for TabTabTab is public on GitHub at the following link.

https://github.com/okaryo/TabTabTab

Also, TabTabTab use GitHub Discussions to allow anyone to freely suggest features, report bugs, or ask questions. Let's work together to make TabTabTab even better!

https://github.com/okaryo/TabTabTab/discussions

long.de,ko:
TabTabTab is an innovative solution for tab management. With this extension, your browsing environment becomes organized and your productivity skyrockets. Free yourself from tab chaos and allow your focus to center on your important tasks. Give TabTabTab a try to enhance your digital lifestyle.

Features for this extension:

* Display of open window and tab list
* Display of elapsed time since last tab activation
* Display duplicated tabs
* Basic tab operations like bookmarking, URL copying, and pinning with a right-click
* Capture screenshots of your active tab's visible area via right-click menu
* Move to selected tab
* Search tabs
* Close tabs
* Automatic clean up of tabs that have not been used for a certain period (ON/OFF and duration can be set from the settings page)
* Dark mode

The source code for TabTabTab is public on GitHub at the following link. Feel free to submit bug reports, suggest improvements, or contribute in any other way you'd like.

https://github.com/okaryo/TabTabTab

long.ja:
TabTabTab: All In One Tab Manager

TabTabTabはタブ管理のための革新的な解決策です。この拡張機能を使用することで、あなたのブラウジング環境は整理され、生産性が飛躍的に向上します。タブの混乱から解放され、重要なタスクに集中できるようになります。TabTabTabを試して、あなたのデジタルライフスタイルを向上させてみてください。

機能一覧:

* 開いているウィンドウとタブのリストを表示(グループタブにも対応)
* ドラッグ&ドロップでのタブの並び替え
* ウィンドウとグループの保存&復元
* 自動グルーピング
* ウィンドウのマージ
* 最後にアクティブにしたタブからの経過時間を表示
* 重複したタブを表示&重複の解消
* URLのコピー、ピン留め、グルーピングなどの基本的なタブ操作
* アクティブなタブの表示領域のスクリーンショットをキャプチャ
* 選択したタブに移動
* タブの検索
* タブを閉じる
* 一定期間使用されていないタブの自動クリーンアップ（設定ページからON/OFFと期間を設定可能）
* サイドパネルでのタブ一覧
* ダークモード

TabTabTabのソースコードは以下のリンクでGitHubに公開されています。

https://github.com/okaryo/TabTabTab

また、 TabTabTabではGitHub Discussionsを使って誰でも自由に機能の提案やバグ報告、質問ができるようにしています。ぜひ一緒にTabTabTabをより良いものにしていきましょう！

https://github.com/okaryo/TabTabTab/discussions
